title: How to Make Peanut Butter Banana Bagels

steps.headline: Place the bagel slices into a toaster and toast until golden brown.
Slice the banana into circular-shaped pieces.
Spread the peanut butter onto the toasted bagel, spreading 3–4 tablespoons (44.4–59.1 ml) of peanut butter on each slice.
Place each banana on the bagel all around it.
Close the bagel together with one piece and place on a serving plate.
Serve.
steps.description: Consider dunking the sandwich in honey for a sweeter taste. Serve with a glass of milk, if desired. Enjoy!

steps.headline: Place the bagel slices into a toaster and toast until golden brown.
Slice the banana into circular-shaped pieces.
Spread the peanut butter on one of the pieces of the bagel.
Spread the chocolate spread on the other piece of bagel.
Place each banana on the bagel all around it.
Serve.
steps.description: Consider dunking the sandwich in honey for a sweeter taste. Serve with a glass of milk, if desired. Enjoy!

methods.name: Peanut Butter and Jelly Banana Bagel

steps.headline: Place the bagel slices into a toaster and toast until golden brown.
Slice the banana into circular-shaped pieces.
Spread the peanut butter on one of the pieces of the bagel.
Spread the jelly on the other piece of bagel.
Place each banana on the bagel all around it.
Serve.
steps.description: Consider dunking the sandwich in honey for a sweeter taste. Serve with a glass of milk, if desired. Enjoy!

methods.name: Peanut Butter Banana and Strawberry Bagel

steps.headline: Place the bagel slices into a toaster and toast until golden brown.
Slice the banana into circular-shaped pieces.
Chop the washed strawberries into halves.
Spread the peanut butter onto the toasted bagel, spreading 3–4 tablespoons (44.4–59.1 ml) of peanut butter on each slice.
Place each banana and strawberry slice on the bagel all around it.
Close the bagel together with one piece and place on a serving plate.
Serve.
steps.description: Consider dunking the sandwich in honey for a sweeter taste. Serve with a glass of milk, if desired. Enjoy!

steps.headline: Preheat the stovetop to medium heat and spread a skillet with the butter.
Slice the banana into circular-shaped pieces.
Spread the peanut butter onto the toasted bagel, spreading 3–4 tablespoons (44.4–59.1 ml) of peanut butter on each slice.
Place each banana on the bagel all around it.
Close the bagel together with one piece.
Grill the bagel until golden brown and crispy.
Serve.
steps.description: Consider dunking the sandwich in maple syrup for a sweeter taste. Serve with a glass of milk, if desired. Enjoy!

text: Peanut Butter Banana Bagel Place the bagel slices into a toaster and toast until golden brown.  Slice the banana into circular-shaped pieces.  Spread the peanut butter onto the toasted bagel, spreading 3–4 tablespoons (44.4–59.1 ml) of peanut butter on each slice.  Place each banana on the bagel all around it.  Close the bagel together with one piece and place on a serving plate.  Serve. Consider dunking the sandwich in honey for a sweeter taste. Serve with a glass of milk, if desired. Enjoy! Chocolate Peanut Butter Banana Bagel Place the bagel slices into a toaster and toast until golden brown.  Slice the banana into circular-shaped pieces.  Spread the peanut butter on one of the pieces of the bagel.  Spread the chocolate spread on the other piece of bagel.  Place each banana on the bagel all around it.  Serve. Consider dunking the sandwich in honey for a sweeter taste. Serve with a glass of milk, if desired. Enjoy! Peanut Butter and Jelly Banana Bagel Place the bagel slices into a toaster and toast until golden brown.  Slice the banana into circular-shaped pieces.  Spread the peanut butter on one of the pieces of the bagel.  Spread the jelly on the other piece of bagel.  Place each banana on the bagel all around it.  Serve. Consider dunking the sandwich in honey for a sweeter taste. Serve with a glass of milk, if desired. Enjoy! Peanut Butter Banana and Strawberry Bagel Place the bagel slices into a toaster and toast until golden brown.  Slice the banana into circular-shaped pieces.  Chop the washed strawberries into halves.  Spread the peanut butter onto the toasted bagel, spreading 3–4 tablespoons (44.4–59.1 ml) of peanut butter on each slice.  Place each banana and strawberry slice on the bagel all around it.  Close the bagel together with one piece and place on a serving plate.  Serve. Consider dunking the sandwich in honey for a sweeter taste. Serve with a glass of milk, if desired. Enjoy! Grilled Peanut Butter Banana Bagel Preheat the stovetop to medium heat and spread a skillet with the butter.  Slice the banana into circular-shaped pieces.  Spread the peanut butter onto the toasted bagel, spreading 3–4 tablespoons (44.4–59.1 ml) of peanut butter on each slice.  Place each banana on the bagel all around it.  Close the bagel together with one piece.  Grill the bagel until golden brown and crispy.  Serve. Consider dunking the sandwich in maple syrup for a sweeter taste. Serve with a glass of milk, if desired. Enjoy!
